description.value:
Activation: *

Thanks to your study of the history of rhetoric, you confidently craft your speeches for widespread appeal.

When you use your @UUID[Compendium.cosmere-rpg.heroic-paths.Item.l4wRQT2MH0SsxmRQ]{Rousing Presence} or @UUID[Compendium.cosmere-rpg.heroic-paths.Item.4DGwBZ4uDLTaKql2]{Steadfast Challenge}, you can spend focus up to your ranks in Persuasion to affect that many additional targets.
